content.question: The method of mass production that developed during the nineteenth century was a process that

choices.label: relied on the use of power-driven machinery
utilized wireless communications to improve efficiency
gave workers greater autonomy, less supervision, and the chance to be creative
relied on guilds to train artisans
promoted more cooperation between labor unions and factory owners

content.answer: relied on the use of power-driven machinery

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
